Reviews.Title: “Expected far more”
Reviews.Author: SevenBee
Reviews.Content: spent night hotel whilst london business lady hotel pleasant helpful building business paying expectations actual unfortunately left feeling little deflated spacious comfortable decor looked little tacky pattern bedspread busy cheap looking bathroom nice size liked layout couldnt help thinking job cleaning bed linen didnt feel particularly quality location superb staff excellent sleep night stayed price expected quality furnishings classical decor pleasant stay money id stay else future
